text: trong ban bangkeut mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei yeang pit brakd . trong thveu aoy peloyb krob leu pelothngai haey trong thveu aoy pelothngai krob leu peloyb . haey trong ban banhchea preahatity ning preah chnt aoy daertamokonlong rieng khluon rhautadl pelkamnt . tae trong minmen mha khlangpouke mha aphytosa te ryy
